achievements.name: First Blood
achievements.description: Die for the first time.

achievements.name: Death Proof
achievements.description: Die 100 times.

achievements.name: Accidental Explosion
achievements.description: Killed by an Explosive/Corrosive Barrel.

achievements.name: All for Nothing
achievements.description: Die when the BOSS has 10% HP or less remaining.

achievements.name: Die After Revival
achievements.description: Die within 10 seconds after Revival.

achievements.name: Abstracted Driver
achievements.description: Be killed by a trap twice in a single game.

achievements.name: Lava Hell
achievements.description: Die from Burning.

achievements.name: Lethal Gas
achievements.description: Die from Decay.

achievements.name: Thunder Outrage
achievements.description: Die from Shock.

achievements.name: Painful Death
achievements.description: Die with over 4,000 copper.

achievements.name: Shopaholic
achievements.description: Buy 100 items from the Peddler.

achievements.name: Generous Boss
achievements.description: Buy everything at the Peddler.

achievements.name: One More Time
achievements.description: Spend over 2,000 copper to Reforge at the same Craftsman.

achievements.name: A Penny Left
achievements.description: Unable to purchase any items at the Peddler in a BOSS Stage.

achievements.name: Money for Nothing
achievements.description: Purchase items from 3 Peddlers without spending copper in a single game.

achievements.name: Enlightened Beast
achievements.description: Defeat Lu Wu for the first time.

achievements.name: Slayer of Ichthyosaur
achievements.description: Defeat Ichthyosaurus Offspring for the first time.

achievements.name: Powerful Fire
achievements.description: Defeat any boss within 10s.

achievements.name: Deft Move
achievements.description: Defeat any boss without taking any damage.

achievements.name: Rookie
achievements.description: Equip 1 Occult Scroll.

achievements.name: Junior
achievements.description: Equip 10 Occult Scrolls.

achievements.name: Field Proficiency
achievements.description: Equip 15 Occult Scrolls.

achievements.name: Expert
achievements.description: Equip 5 Legendary Occult Scrolls.

achievements.name: Master
achievements.description: Equip 10 Legendary Occult Scrolls.

achievements.name: New Beginning
achievements.description: Equip 2 weapons.

achievements.name: Sharpshooter
achievements.description: Deal 100 consecutive Crit hits.

achievements.name: Tactical Sniper
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 enemies at a distance of 30 meter or more.

achievements.name: Savage Butcher
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 enemies within a distance of 4 meters.

achievements.name: Blacksmith's Apprentice
achievements.description: Upgrade Weapon once at the Craftsman.

achievements.name: Just for Fun
achievements.description: Reforge a weapon at the Craftsman.

achievements.name: Best Equipment
achievements.description: Have 5 Inscriptions on a Weapon.

achievements.name: Rambo
achievements.description: Fire 100,000 ammo.

achievements.name: Grenade Master
achievements.description: Defeat 1,000 enemies with Secondary Skill.

achievements.name: Dual-Wield Elite
achievements.description: With Ao Bai, have a single Dual-Wield last for over 60 seconds.

achievements.name: Energy Orb Master
achievements.description: With Crown Prince, use Energy Orb to freeze enemies for over 1,000 seconds in total.

achievements.name: Happy-Go-Lucky
achievements.description: Break 3,000 Jars.

achievements.name: An Eye for Detail
achievements.description: Discover a Hidden Stage for the first time.

achievements.name: Elementary Upgrade
achievements.description: Upgrade the first Talent.

achievements.name: Ultimate Grinder
achievements.description: Reach Level 100.

achievements.name: Chronic Disaster
achievements.description: Be affected by Burning, Decay and Shock in a single game.

achievements.name: Burning City
achievements.description: Defeat 1,000 Burning enemies.

achievements.name: Poison Ivy
achievements.description: Defeat 1,000 Decaying enemies.

achievements.name: Electromagnetic Effect
achievements.description: Defeat 1,000 Shocked enemies.

achievements.name: Hallucination Poison
achievements.description: Inflict Manipulation Effect on enemies 50 times in a single game.

achievements.name: Mad Bomber
achievements.description: Inflict Explosion Effect on enemies 50 times in a single game.

achievements.name: Gas Attack
achievements.description: Inflict Miasma Effect on enemies 50 times in a single game.

achievements.name: Combat Medic
achievements.description: Revive Teammates 100 times.

achievements.name: Easy Win
achievements.description: Revived after teammates complete the stages.

achievements.name: Team Captain
achievements.description: Pass a stage with all teammates being knocked down.

achievements.name: Hard Fight
achievements.description: Pass all stages with all teammates being knocked down 10 times or more in a single game.

achievements.name: Death of Yoruhime-Maru
achievements.description: Kill Yoruhime-Maru for the first time.

achievements.name: No Way to Escape
achievements.description: Be killed by an Exploding Lantern Spirit.

achievements.name: No Place to Hide
achievements.description: Be hooked 5 times by White Shark in a battle.

achievements.name: Crab Buffet
achievements.description: Kill 30 Fiddler Crabs with Fire DMG in a battle.

achievements.name: Wave-like Subtle Step
achievements.description: Open all chests in the trap level without taking damage.

achievements.name: Top Athlete
achievements.description: Open all chests in the jumping level.

achievements.name: Conqueror
achievements.description: Complete Elite difficulty for the first time.

achievements.name: Buzzer Beater
achievements.description: Kill Corrupt Monk before the Exploding Lantern Spirits are summoned.

achievements.name: Worm Hunter
achievements.description: Kill 50 Desert worms without taking any damage.

achievements.name: Battlefield Radar
achievements.description: Kill Yoruhime-Maru without taking any damage from Elysian Artillery.

achievements.name: Air Strike
achievements.description: With Qing Yan, kill 5 or more enemies in a single Leap 50 times.

achievements.name: Eyes on Weakness
achievements.description: Kill 50 Rogue Arsonists by breaking the oil barrels on their backs.

achievements.name: Erudition
achievements.description: Encounter all elite monsters.

achievements.name: Painting Master
achievements.description: Unlock all monsters in the logbook.

achievements.name: Victory of Crown Prince
achievements.description: Win a game as Crown Prince.

achievements.name: Victory of Ao Bai
achievements.description: Win a game as Ao Bai.

achievements.name: Victory of Qing Yan
achievements.description: Win a game as Qing Yan.

achievements.name: Arms Dealer
achievements.description: Unlock all weapons.

achievements.name: Occultism Leader
achievements.description: Unlock all Occult Scrolls.

achievements.name: Art of Explosion
achievements.description: Kill 100 enemies by Explosive/Corrosive Barrels.

achievements.name: Victory of Lei Luo
achievements.description: Win a game as Lei Luo.

achievements.name: Son of Thunder
achievements.description: With Lei Luo, use Fatal Current for more than 1000 seconds in total.

achievements.name: Philanthropist
achievements.description: Share 100 items in total.

achievements.name: Lucky Draw
achievements.description: Obtain a weapon with two or more exclusive inscriptions.

achievements.name: Professional Athlete
achievements.description: Complete Normal difficulty in 30 minutes.

achievements.name: Sports Car
achievements.description: Complete Elite difficulty in 30 minutes.

achievements.name: The Sky is the Limit
achievements.description: Complete Nightmare difficulty in 30 minutes.

achievements.name: Fresh Start
achievements.description: Complete one Daily Challenge.

achievements.name: Master of Daily Challenge
achievements.description: Complete five different Daily Challenges.

achievements.name: Legendary Shot
achievements.description: Deals more than 300,000 damage in a single hit.

achievements.name: Advanced Weapon
achievements.description: Carry a weapon whose level is higher than 12.

achievements.name: Everlasting Martyr
achievements.description: Kill Golem for the first time.

achievements.name: Raging Winds
achievements.description: Kill Wind God for the first time.

achievements.name: Victory of Tao
achievements.description: Win a game as Tao.

achievements.name: Sword Storm
achievements.description: With Tao, summon more than 10,000 flying swords.

achievements.name: Pacified Serpent
achievements.description: Defeat Abyssal Serpent for the first time.

achievements.name: Drown Into Nightmare
achievements.description: Complete Nightmare difficulty for the first time.

achievements.name: 1 Life Clear
achievements.description: Complete any difficulty without spending any soul essence to revive.

achievements.name: Qian Sui's Win
achievements.description: Win a game as Qian Sui.

achievements.name: Absolute Defense
achievements.description: With Qian Sui, block attacks 500 times in total with Tidal Aspis.

achievements.name: Breaking Dawn
achievements.description: Defeat Pole Monarch for the first time.

achievements.name: Hold Your Breath
achievements.description: When the Polar Monarch attempts to shatter the spiritual jade, take it down within the last 3s before his charging process is finished.

achievements.name: Fully in Control
achievements.description: Complete any reincarnation difficulty without ever purchasing any spiritual blessing.

achievements.name: Efficient Utilization
achievements.description: Recycle an item.

achievements.name: Diligence and Thrift
achievements.description: Obtain a total of 10,000 copper by recycling items.

achievements.name: Thrifty Expert
achievements.description: Obtain 1,000 copper by recycling items in a single run.

achievements.name: Energy Chain
achievements.description: Obtain Crown Prince's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Full Force
achievements.description: Obtain Ao Bai's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Soaring Eagle
achievements.description: Obtain Qing Yan's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Thunderous Growl
achievements.description: Obtain Lei Luo's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Sword Dance
achievements.description: Obtain Tao's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Blue Wave
achievements.description: Obtain Qian Sui's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Temporary Close
achievements.description: Complete all achievements of Gunfire Reborn base game.

achievements.name: Born of Fire
achievements.description: Win a game as Li.

achievements.name: Victory of Xing Zhe
achievements.description: Win a game as Xing Zhe.

achievements.name: Spare No Effort
achievements.description: Consume all energy to cast Spiritual Flame for 200 times.

achievements.name: Deadly Strike
achievements.description: Defeat 500 enemies with Soul Strike.

achievements.name: Legend of Crimson Fox
achievements.description: Obtain Li's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Soul Taker
achievements.description: Obtain Xing Zhe's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Pragmatist
achievements.description: Acquire 15 different effects of Spiritual Link.

achievements.name: Return to the Apex
achievements.description: Finish Mysterious Jokul.

achievements.name: Hell Hunter
achievements.description: Defeat 30 enhanced Elite monster.

achievements.name: Greater Evil Exorcised
achievements.description: Defeat Gluttony for the first time.

achievements.name: Spiritual Jade
achievements.description: Unlock 20 Spiritual Jade in [Spiritual Assault].

achievements.name: Victory of Zi Xiao
achievements.description: Win a game with Zi Xiao

achievements.name: Victory of Nona
achievements.description: Win a game as Nona.

achievements.name: Destiny's Choice
achievements.description: Using 200 times of [Falling Star] of [Legendary Astrohouses].

achievements.name: Shelter From Storm
achievements.description: Use [Mecha Drop] to taunt enemies 500 times.

achievements.name: Unwavering Preference
achievements.description: Obtain Zi Xiao's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Never Defeated
achievements.description: Obtain Nona's exclusive level frame.

achievements.name: Endless Journey
achievements.description: The first time into the Endless Journey.

achievements.name: Back-to-Back
achievements.description: Defeat the Pole Monarch and the Gluttony Sands in a single run of Endless Journey

achievements.name: Victory of Lyn
achievements.description: Win a game as Lyn.

achievements.name: Victory of Momo
achievements.description: Win a game as Momo.

achievements.name: The Most Slient Winter
achievements.description: Use Lyn to [execute] enemies 50 times through Frost Burial

achievements.name: Spirit and Shade
achievements.description: Use Momo in Ink Shade or Ink Spirit status, accumulate duration 2000s
